com.xhive.core.interfaces
Interface XhiveDriverIf.XhiveDriverObserverIf

Enclosing interface:
XhiveDriverIf
public static interface XhiveDriverIf.XhiveDriverObserverIf

An interface that can be implemented by application code to be notified of events in the X-Hive/DB subsystem.

Since:
X-Hive/DB 7.0
See Also:
XhiveDriverIf.addObserver(XhiveDriverObserverIf)

Field Summary
static int DRIVER_HALTED
          Event type indicating that the X-Hive/DB subsystem has halted due to a fatal internal error.
 
Method Summary
 void notify(int type, XhiveDriverIf driver, java.lang.Object argument)
          This method will be called when an event happens.
 

Field Detail

DRIVER_HALTED

static final int DRIVER_HALTED
Event type indicating that the X-Hive/DB subsystem has halted due to a fatal internal error. The java.lang.Throwable that caused the error will be passed as argument to notify(int, com.xhive.core.interfaces.XhiveDriverIf, java.lang.Object).

Since:
X-Hive/DB 7.0
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

notify

void notify(int type,
            XhiveDriverIf driver,
            java.lang.Object argument)
This method will be called when an event happens.

Parameters:
type - The type of the event.
driver - The driver that this observer was added to and that caused the event.
argument - An argument that differs per event type.
Since:
X-Hive/DB 7.0
